conbody.p: The Package Explorer view pane is located at the top left of the DS Workbench interface, listing all your projects in tree view. This view pane provides an interface for exploring your workspace; projects, packages and files.
Many actions in the Package Explorer can apply by right-clicking on tree element.
This view belongs to the Design perspective. If you close this view by mistake you can apply a reset Perspective to get it back.
